description:
In "Chickempic," the multiplayer mode of Viviter where you can play with up to 8 players, we're adding the "UNITED ROBOT" mini-game!
So, the enemy is giving it their all, huh? Well then, we'll do the sameâ€”
VIVITTIZER, activate the unite formation!
Let's synchronize our breaths! Uniting is the highlight of being a robot! Transforming into the strongest, coolest giant robot with perfect precision!
Alright! Timid unite! VIVITTIZER!! Victory will be ours!!!
name: Additional mini-game "UNITED ROBOT"
